questions.title: 近来你的大学生活如何啊？
questions.answer: How are you getting on with your days in university?

questions.title: 你的雅思英语准备得怎么样了啊？
questions.answer: How are you getting along with your IELTS?

questions.title: 你和你的丈夫还有他的家人相处得怎么样？
questions.answer: How are you getting on with your husband and his families?

questions.title: 汤姆与一家大公司合作的壁画进展得怎么样了？
questions.answer: How is Tom getting along with his fresco which is cooperated with a largecompany?

answer.en: How are you getting on recently?
Enjoy my life sip by sip.

title: ——你近来工作如何？
——虽然工作辛苦，但是能自得其乐。

answer.en: How are you getting along with your work？
I'm highly diverted with myself, though I have to work hard.
How are you getting on with your garden?
Seeding, weeding and exterminating aphis on my knees everyday.
